languages.text: "Все новые и новые осужденные удостаиваются великого блага — пройти сервиторизацию и, избавившись от греховного сознания, служить Империуму без сомнений и слабости. Футфол вновь станет бастионом закона и праведности — я истреблю всю ересь, что мешает безвольным отдаваться на благо труда во имя Его!"

"More and more new convicts are being granted the great boon of undergoing Servitude Imperpituis and, having rid themselves of reprehensible consciousness, of serving the Imperium free from doubt and weakness. Footfall will once again become a bastion of law and righteousness — I will eradicate all heresy that prevents the faithless from giving themselves over to the good of toiling in His name!"
languages.original_text: "Все новые и новые осужденные удостаиваются великого блага — пройти сервиторизацию и, избавившись от греховного сознания, служить Империуму без сомнений и слабости. Футфол вновь станет бастионом закона и праведности — я истреблю всю ересь, что мешает безвольным отдаваться на благо труда во имя Его!"

traits.locale_text: "More and more new convicts are being granted the great boon of undergoing Servitude Imperpituis and, having rid themselves of sinful consciousness, of serving the Imperium free from doubt and weakness. Footfall will once again become a bastion of law and righteousness — I will eradicate all heresy that prevents the faithless from giving themselves over to the good of toiling in His name!"

"More and more new convicts are being granted the great boon of undergoing Servitude Imperpituis and, having rid themselves of sinful consciousness, of serving the Imperium free from doubt and weakness. Footfall will once again become a bastion of law and righteousness — I will eradicate all heresy that prevents the faithless from giving themselves over to the good of toiling in His name!"

"More and more new convicts are being granted the great boon of undergoing Servitude Imperpituis and, having rid themselves of sinful consciousness, of serving the Imperium free from doubt and weakness. Footfall will once again become a bastion of law and righteousness — I will eradicate all heresy that prevents the faithless from giving themselves over to the good of toiling in His name!"

"More and more new convicts are being granted the great boon of undergoing Servitude Imperpituis and, having rid themselves of reprehensible consciousness, of serving the Imperium free from doubt and weakness. Footfall will once again become a bastion of law and righteousness — I will eradicate all heresy that prevents the faithless from giving themselves over to the good of toiling in His name!"

languages.text: “越来越多的新囚犯得到了伟大的恩赐，被改造成了机仆。他们摆脱了罪恶的意识，也摆脱了怀疑与软弱，全心全意地为帝国服务。落脚港将将再次成为法律与正义的堡垒！我将铲除一切异端邪说，引导那些不虔之人重新踏上信仰的道路，以神皇的名义奉献一切！”
languages.original_text: "More and more new convicts are being granted the great boon of undergoing Servitude Imperpituis and, having rid themselves of sinful consciousness, of serving the Imperium free from doubt and weakness. Footfall will once again become a bastion of law and righteousness — I will eradicate all heresy that prevents the faithless from giving themselves over to the good of toiling in His name!"

traits.locale_text: “越来越多的新囚犯得到了伟大的恩赐，被改造成了机仆。他们摆脱了罪恶的意识，也摆脱了怀疑与软弱，全心全意地为帝国服务。落脚港将将再次成为法律与正义的堡垒！我将铲除一切异端邪说，引导那些不虔之人重新踏上信仰的道路，以神皇的名义奉献一切！”

languages.text: "Mehr und mehr neue Sträflinge erhalten den großen Segen des Servitut Imperpituis, und nachdem sie sich ihres sündigen Bewusstseins entledigt haben, dürfen sie dem Imperium frei von Zweifel und Schwäche dienen. Footfall wird wieder zur Bastion von Gesetz und Rechtschaffenheit werden — ich werde sämtliche Ketzerei auslöschen, welche die Ungläubigen daran hindert, im Namen des Imperators für das Gute zu arbeiten!"
languages.original_text: "More and more new convicts are being granted the great boon of undergoing Servitude Imperpituis and, having rid themselves of sinful consciousness, of serving the Imperium free from doubt and weakness. Footfall will once again become a bastion of law and righteousness — I will eradicate all heresy that prevents the faithless from giving themselves over to the good of toiling in His name!"

traits.locale_text: "Mehr und mehr neue Sträflinge erhalten den großen Segen des Servitut Imperpituis, und nachdem sie sich ihres sündigen Bewusstseins entledigt haben, dürfen sie dem Imperium frei von Zweifel und Schwäche dienen. Footfall wird wieder zur Bastion von Gesetz und Rechtschaffenheit werden — ich werde sämtliche Ketzerei auslöschen, welche die Ungläubigen daran hindert, im Namen des Imperators für das Gute zu arbeiten!"

languages.text: « De plus en plus de prisonniers ont la chance d'être soumis à la Servitude Imperpituis, qui les débarrasse de toute conscience pécheresse et leur permet de servir l'Imperium sans se laisser détourner de leur devoir par le doute ou la faiblesse. Une fois de plus, Castel deviendra un bastion de la justice et de la vertu. J'éradiquerai toute trace d'hérésie qui pourrait empêcher les infidèles d'accepter de se mettre au service de l'Empereur ! »
languages.original_text: "More and more new convicts are being granted the great boon of undergoing Servitude Imperpituis and, having rid themselves of sinful consciousness, of serving the Imperium free from doubt and weakness. Footfall will once again become a bastion of law and righteousness — I will eradicate all heresy that prevents the faithless from giving themselves over to the good of toiling in His name!"

traits.locale_text: « De plus en plus de prisonniers ont la chance d'être soumis à la Servitude Imperpituis, qui les débarrasse de toute conscience pécheresse et leur permet de servir l'Imperium sans se laisser détourner de leur devoir par le doute ou la faiblesse. Une fois de plus, Castel deviendra un bastion de la justice et de la vertu. J'éradiquerai toute trace d'hérésie qui pourrait empêcher les infidèles d'accepter de se mettre au service de l'Empereur ! »

languages.text: «Cada vez son más los convictos que reciben el gran don de la Servidumbre Imperpituis y, tras librarse de su abominable consciencia, servir al Imperium sin dudas ni debilidades. Paso volverá a ser un bastión de la ley y la rectitud. ¡Erradicaré toda herejía que impida a estos paganos entregarse a su trabajo para mayor gloria del Emperador!».
languages.original_text: "More and more new convicts are being granted the great boon of undergoing Servitude Imperpituis and, having rid themselves of reprehensible consciousness, of serving the Imperium free from doubt and weakness. Footfall will once again become a bastion of law and righteousness — I will eradicate all heresy that prevents the faithless from giving themselves over to the good of toiling in His name!"

traits.locale_text: «Cada vez son más los convictos que reciben el gran don de la Servidumbre Imperpituis y, tras librarse de su abominable consciencia, servir al Imperium sin dudas ni debilidades. Paso volverá a ser un bastión de la ley y la rectitud. ¡Erradicaré toda herejía que impida a estos paganos entregarse a su trabajo para mayor gloria del Emperador!».

languages.text: 「ますます多くの新しい受刑者が、大いなる不眠奉仕の刑を受けている。罪の意識から解放された彼らは、帝国に奉仕する。フットフォールは再び法と正義の拠り所になる。 私は、信念を持たない者達が善に身を任せるのを邪魔する異端を、全滅させる！主の御名において！」
languages.original_text: "More and more new convicts are being granted the great boon of undergoing Servitude Imperpituis and, having rid themselves of sinful consciousness, of serving the Imperium free from doubt and weakness. Footfall will once again become a bastion of law and righteousness — I will eradicate all heresy that prevents the faithless from giving themselves over to the good of toiling in His name!"

traits.locale_text: 「ますます多くの新しい受刑者が、大いなる不眠奉仕の刑を受けている。罪の意識から解放された彼らは、帝国に奉仕する。フットフォールは再び法と正義の拠り所になる。 私は、信念を持たない者達が善に身を任せるのを邪魔する異端を、全滅させる！主の御名において！」

languages.text: "Müebbet Hizmet'e nail olma lütfuna her geçen gün daha çok fail kavuşuyor. O menfur zihniyetlerinden kurtulup şüpheden ve zayıflıktan arınmış bir hâlde İmparatorluk'a hizmet ediyorlar artık. Binliman bir kez daha düzenin ve doğruluğun kalesi olacak. İmansızlar, kâfirlikten ötürü O'nun yolunda çalışıp çabalama kısmetine ulaşamıyor. Her türlü kâfirliğin kökünü kazıyıp nasiplerine kavuşturacağım onları!"
languages.original_text: "More and more new convicts are being granted the great boon of undergoing Servitude Imperpituis and, having rid themselves of reprehensible consciousness, of serving the Imperium free from doubt and weakness. Footfall will once again become a bastion of law and righteousness — I will eradicate all heresy that prevents the faithless from giving themselves over to the good of toiling in His name!"
